name: Robobat KABOOM!
description:
Fly a robot bat through crystal-filled caverns. Swoop, dive, and try not to explode!

Controls

Use the arrow keys, or a controller, to steer your bat. Angle down to build speed, and fly up to slow down.

I recommend playing with an Xbox controller if you have one.

Downloads

Windows will tell you the source isn't trusted, but I promise I'm very trustworthy :P

There's no web player (yet) because Unity is being a butt. I'm working on it.

Wowie Jam

This game was made in about ten hours for the third Wowie jam. Working weekends sucks… 

Feedback

Lots, please!

Credits

Developed by David Ford.

Playtesting and sanity check by Rika Sasaki. 

Sound effects, textures and music from the Wowie jam resource pack. 

Extra sounds from ZapSplat and CFXR.

Font from Google Fonts.

Made using Unity, Blender, Gimp, Inkscape and Audacity.
